sentence: The Florida compound will host back-to-back fundraisers in mid-March, along with a third Herschel Walker event.

title: The Jolt: Trump stepping up focus on Georgia candidates

sentence: White House removes Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from advisory panel after Senate runs March 24, 202200:17 But by the time McCormick showed up Wednesday, Trump was already close to endorsing Oz, said two other Trump advisers, who said Trump wasnt swayed by the arguments of those close to him who were backing McCormick.
title: Dr. Oz bets Trump endorsement can catapult him in Pa. Senate race

title: The Memo: McCarthy furor underlines Trumps grip on GOP

sentence: Federal and state campaign records show the GOP candidates backed by the former president spent tens of thousands of dollars at the private club, and Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker spent nearly $200,000 there so far during the election cycle, including a payment of more than $135,000 in December and about $65,000 last month, reported CNBC.
author: Travis Gettys
title: GOP candidates spent $400K at Mar-A-Lago asking for Trumps endorsement
